page.title: 03WADDINGTON PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Number of registered electors......360 Number of Parish Councillors........15 (8 East Ward,7 West Ward) Number of meetings per year.approx..45 Number of Parish Council employees (all part time) 5. Summary of expenditure for 1985 -------------------------------------- Village Hall maintenance........Â£5,200 (Income from lettings..........Â£3,700) Community Centre maintenance....Â£3,300 (Income from lettings..........Â£2,300) Holiday playschemes...............Â£540 Street Lighting.................Â£5,300 Maintenance of Playing Fields...Â£1,800 Maintenance of Burial Ground......Â£600 Other village facilities..........Â£400 Subscriptions.....................Â£400 Administration..................Â£3,400 Repayment of loans..............Â£4,400 Plus various capital schemes listed below amounting to..............Â£8,500
